name: Stop SOPA Ireland
author: Abban Dunne

sections.description: Even though SOPA in the US has been shelved (for now) a similar law is being sneaked into Irish law without any discussion. This plugin lets you show your opposition to it.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip stop-sopa-ireland.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
1.3

Changing text to promote the new pledge page.

1.2

Adding a link to the anti ACTA protest.

1.1.4

Preventing jQuery from loading in admin panel. This is an education in WP plugin best practices.

1.1.3

Adding jQuery no-conflicting rules to the javascript.

1.1.2

This is becoming farcical, fixing another bug.

1.1.1

Fixing a bug in the Firefox bug update, silly rabbit.

1.1

Fixing Firefox bug.

1.0

This is the first release.

short_description: This plugin adds a banner to your site letting people know your support of the stop SOPA Ireland campaign
description: Even though SOPA in the US has been shelved (for now) a similar law is being sneaked into Irish law without any discussion. This plugin lets you show your opposition to it.
